pages.title: Abyss Manatite
pages.text: A Manatite attuned to Water with Runes of Water.$(br)A Ring forged with this Manatite will grant the wearer a the power of the conduit and can also give the grace of a dolphin at will. When used in a staff the caster can make mobs in a radius extremely slow, as they were frozen.

pages.title: Abyss Staffs
pages.text: Duration, Power and Range of the effects depend on the tier of the staff.$(br)Wooden is the worst. Silver has good range, but weaker effects and moderate cooldown. Gold has abysmal range, but powerful effects with a long cooldown. Archmage is the best.
